divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in Huntersville, NC and I noticed a weird glow in the clouds so I pulled over and took some photos. I saw this "glow" with my eyes so it's not lens flare. I'm not sure what it is but I never saw a cloud glow like this. NC Mufon investigator has photos.
Summary: Driving through Huntersville, NC and noticed bizarre glow in the clouds
